page.title: 20KILPECK LIONS FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: Founded in 1977, the home pitch is at {Howton.}The team plays in the Herefordshire Sunday League, playing 22 games each season, also the Shelton Memorial Cup, the HFA Sunday Cup and the Division One. Three players come from Kilpeck, the rest live nearby. Team colours are red shirts and black shorts and socks, with a reserve strip of blue. The team is currently mid division. Between Â£200 & Â£300 per annum is needed to run the team, raised partly by fund raising functions and partly by a levy on players. The{Player of the Year Trophy is awarded at the end of the season by popular vote by team members.
